Package puissance4.bean

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INTERFACE_Screen
    Interface for views management.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Message
    Class allowing creation of Message objects which are exchanged between players.
    Partie
    Class representing a game with its parameters.
    Partie_History
    Class allowing the creation of Partie_History objects representing games we want to save in the history.
    Partie_Save
    Class allowing the creation of a save objects representing games we want to save.
    Puissance4
    Class extending Application and being the application entry point.
    RUN_Connexion
    Class implementing Runnable and managing the "wait for a client connection" step for the server.
    RUN_Emission
    Class implementing Runnable and managing message broadcasts on the network.
    RUN_Reception
    Class implementing Runnable and managing message receptions from the network.
    Validation
    Class containing methods to validate user inputs.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EnumSauvegarde
    Allows to select historisation or save.
